scripts.setup:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && echo VITE_SUPABASE_URL="ENTER_YOUR_SUPABASE_URL" > .env && echo VITE_SUPABASE_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_SUPABASE_KEY" >> .env && echo OPENROUTER_API_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_OPENROUTER_KEY" >> .env && echo GEMINI_API_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_GEMINI_KEY" >> .env && echo GROQ_API_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_GROQ_KEY" >> .env && echo VITE_BACKEND_URL="ENTER_BACKEND_URL" >> .env && echo VITE_FRONTEND_URL="ENTER_FRONTEND_URL" >> .env && echo VITE_FRONTEND_DEV="http://localhost:5173" >> .env
scripts.setup:backend: cd ai-engine && echo SUPABASE_URL="ENTER_YOUR_SUPABASE_URL" > .env && echo SUPABASE_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_SUPABASE_KEY" >> .env && echo OPENROUTER_API_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_OPENROUTER_KEY" >> .env && echo GEMINI_API_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_GEMINI_KEY" >> .env && echo PINECONE_API_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_PINECONE_KEY" >> .env && echo GROQ_API_KEY="ENTER_YOUR_GROQ_KEY" >> .env && echo GMAIL_USER="ENTER_GMAIL_USER" >> .env && echo GMAIL_APP_PASSWORD="ENTER_GMAIL_APP_PASSWORD" >> .env && echo FRONTEND_URL="http://localhost:5173" >> .env && echo FRONTEND_PROD="ENTER_FRONTEND_PROD_URL" >> .env
scripts.setup:venv: cd ai-engine && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:venv
